Job Description: Core Java (Must be good in Core Java concepts, Java Programming Practices, Clean Coding).     Spring Framework (Must have working experience in Spring Core).     Any SQL framework (Must have working experience in any of these: Hibernate / JPA / MyBatis / Spring Data / Others).     REST API (Must have working experience developing REST API).     SQL Database (Must have working experience with any of the databases: Oracle / MySQL / PostgreSQL / SQLServer).     Git (Must have working experience with basic GIT).     Maven or Gradle (Must have working experience in building Java projects using maven or Gradle).     Should be able to work independently under guidance.     DESIRED SKILLS:      Advanced Java (Threading, Performance Optimization).     Spring Boot.     Other Spring frameworks (Spring Security, Spring Batch, Others).     Microservices Any NoSQL database (MongoDB, Cassandra, Others).     Application designing concepts
